name: Kidnapped?
description: As you wake up from a bad headache, you take in the surrounds and see you aren't at your own home. You see the marks on your body and connect that you have been kidnapped! Upon taking a peek out the room you have been left in, there seems to be a way out! But there's a problem: Your Kidnapper is blocking the one and only exit, and will stop at nothing to keep you from leaving.
